location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 30 from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus reports that he had received letters from the Imam of Muscat [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd] and the Agent at Muscat indicating that the Imam intended to commence hostilities at Bushire immediately. Stannus intended to avoid all interference in the dispute until directed otherwise, although he would take any opportunity to achieve a peaceful settlement.
